feed.title: BirdNET-Analyzer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for BirdNET-Analyzer: v1.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Labels for custom classifier get saved with utf-8 by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/263
  • Convert file duration to int by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/264
  • Added version check in GUI by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/268
  • Limit the number of rows in the GUI to 100 by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/273
  • lower() when checking for non-event classes for binary classfication by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/289
  • Mixup only uses positive samples and does not mixup the same samples multiple times fix by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/280
  • Added batch offset to timestamps and initalise results outside loop by @joshctaylor in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/300
  • Updated raven selection table columns to be more convinient for Raven users by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/306
  • Moved logs to user home dir by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/315
  • Add zeros instead of noise to short samples by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/313
  • Swedish labels are now capitalized by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/318
  • Add an option for not analyzing files that have been analyzed by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/316
  • Search for non-event indices now more memory efficient by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/317 (credit @Tindtily)
  • Uninstall icon set to BirdNET icon
  • Option to install globally or to user directory
  • Fixed a bug where segments were incorrectly extracted
  • Added kaleidoscope output to GUI
  • Added a list file for Raven that contains a list of all file paths when using "Combine selection tables" titled <output_file>.list.txt
  • Reduced application size

New Contributors

  • @joshctaylor made their first contribution in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/300

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/compare/v1.0.2...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for BirdNET-Analyzer: v1.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix segments extraction for table type by @wiliamsouza in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/335
  • Raven list file now in correct order by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/351
  • Multi-language support in GUI, added Settings tab (see README) by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/336
  • Complete rewrite of audio.splitsignal to avoid multiple noise padded splits at signal end by @MacJudge in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/352
  • Added error messages in GUI for invalid class combinations by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/357
  • Update BirdNET_GLOBAL_6K_V2.4_Labels_pl.txt by @woheller69 in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/359
  • added error log to settings

New Contributors

  • @wiliamsouza made their first contribution in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/335
  • @MacJudge made their first contribution in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/352

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.0

entry.title: New release for BirdNET-Analyzer: v1.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Review tab by @Josef-Haupt
  • Chinese translation by @SunnyTseng and french translation by @FranciumSoftware
  • During batch analysis you can now specify multiple result types
  • Segments now use combined selection tables if they are present
  • Various bugfixes
  • The GUI now remembers previously selected folders for the individual inputs
  • Mac Installer by @Josef-Haupt

Breaking Change

  • Analysis does not support specifying a specific file as output anymore

Known Issues

  • Extracting segments only works if the audio directory and results directory are identical or a combined results file has been used
  • The BirdNET logo appears as an overlay on some computers when the analysis or training is started via the GUI

New Contributors

  • @MaHaWo made their first contribution in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/386
  • @stefantaubert made their first contribution in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/392
  • @SunnyTseng made their first contribution in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/393
  • @GrunCrow made their first contribution in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/363

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/compare/v1.2.0...v1.3.0

entry.title: New release for BirdNET-Analyzer: v1.3.1
entry.content:
What has changed

  • Fixed the bug in segments that prevented using audio and result files from different folders
  • Fixed the bug that showed the splash-screen during analysis in the windows version
  • Fixed the bug that audio could not be played in the mac version

entry.title: New release for BirdNET-Analyzer: v1.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add portuguese-BR translations to the GUI by @LSMSugai in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/439
  • Russian GUI translation by Александр Цветков by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/448 (Thanks to Alexander-R1BAF)
  • Fixed append-training in installed version of the GUI by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/456
  • writing the states and settings jsons is now more robust by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/457
  • changed single analysis result header to hh:mm:ss format by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/460
  • in GUI batch-analysis the order of the result files is now aligned with the order of the input files by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/473
  • the GUI now resets the loaded custom classifier before starting the analysis by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/473
  • model params after training now include the model version + an additional csv containing the number of samples for each class-combination by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/473
  • native windows directory selection dialog by @nishantnnb in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/473
  • updated chinese labels by @RockerLee in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/473
  • Gui refactor by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/473
  • added labels for bg, ca el, he, hr, in, is, lt, ml, sr by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/480
  • single file analysis output can display utf-8 characters by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/482
  • Updated to Gradio 5 by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/489
  • added some validation to the gui and fixed folder selection issues for training cache by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/491

New Contributors

  • @LSMSugai made their first contribution in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/439
  • @tommy4st made their first contribution in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/492

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/compare/v1.3.1...1.4.0
